firstRunMessage:
This is SRBot connecting for the first time.
 Message me for more information on what I can do, or type `srhelp`

help.info:
Type `srhelp` for this message, or just ask me for help.

* `srhelp trac` for information about Trac.
* `srhelp gerrit` for information about Gerrit.
help.trac: You can use `trac:N` or `t:N` to get a link to https://studentrobotics.org/trac/ticket/N.
help.gerrit: You can use `gerrit:N` or `ger:N` or `g:N` to get a link to https://www.studentrobotics.org/gerrit/#/c/N/.
